direction.raw_text: Easy. Kumar does a handstand. INT. WAREHOUSE. NIGHT Anthony, Dignan, and Bob are sitting at the table in Mr. Henry's office. Dignan's got plans and diagrams spread out. There's music playing in the next room and we can hear people talking outside the door.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Come on, Bob.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I know it, man. Hang on.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Jesus Christ.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Give him a second.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hopscotch. The code name is hopscotch.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Good. Mr. Henry looks in the door. He's got a glass of wine in one hand and a bottle and empty glasses in the other.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Join the party, fellas.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We're just going over a few things. Mr. Henry looks at the plans on the table. He sets down the three glasses and pours some wine.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'll tell you something, Dignan. It is possible to overplan. You don't want to turn the crew into robots. Right? Dignan nods seriously.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You got to have fun with it. There's no point if you're not having any fun. Would you like me to be there tomorrow?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (immediately) Why?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, I think -- MR. HENRY No, if I go out on this job, then it's just another score by Mr. Henry. And I don't see it like that. This is your job. Your creation. I want you to try this. They all try the wine. Mr. Henry watches their reactions.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This is good.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I want to ask a favor, boys. One day, when I'm long gone and all but forgotten, make one last toast to Abe Henry. And remember me as a friend. They drink. EXT. ROOFTOP. NIGHT Back on the roof. Bob and Dignan are sitting at a table with one of the girls. Applejack is dancing with another. Kumar's talking to Reudi. Anthony and Mr. Henry are standing at the edge of the roof, looking out at the city. Mr. Henry's smoking a joint.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, that's just it, Anthony. A lot of criminals have problems. Some of them are alcoholics. Some have drug problems. Others dome from broken homes. I see a real need for healing. Mr. Henry passes the joint to Anthony. Anthony smokes it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But you're thieves. It's what you are.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's an esoteric journey. Anthony passes the joint back to Mr. Henry.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We're renegades from despair.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (nods) Can I ask you something, Mr. Henry?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Absolutely.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Why'd you want to help us?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (inhales, pause, holding in smoke) Because I was like you once. And there was no one there to help me. Mr. Henry exhales the smoke. He hands the joint to Anthony. Anthony takes a hit. They stare out at the darkness. INT. BOB'S HOUSE. NIGHT Anthony and Dignan are sitting in the kitchen. Anthony's got on a t-shirt and boxers. Dignan's wearing a bathrobe. All the lights in the house are out except one in the kitchen. Anthony's drinking a glass of milk. Dignan's got orange juice.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Next week we'll be drinking pina coladas.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (nods) Hopefully this trip'll go a little smoother than the last one. Dignan nods.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Or I might end up with a broken nose.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Did that hurt? Anthony shrugs. There's a long silence.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This'll be a good trip. Anthony nods. Pause. He smiles slightly.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'll try not to hold you back tomorrow.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't think you will.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't want to be too much of a liability.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Look, you're going to do fine. It's
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: : Future Man toweling off. He wears a Speedo swimsuit. He walks over to Bob and Anthony. Anthony's just finishing a drawing of a leaping jungle cat in black and red ink on Bob's shoulder. Future Man stops and looks at them with no feeling.
dialogue.name: dialogue
